description.zh-cn: 中国当代作家、官员，曾任中华人民共和国文化部部长、全国政协常委、全国政协文史和学习委员会主任、中国作协副主席。“人民艺术家”国家荣誉称号获得者。其作品题材广泛，尤其以意识流文学著称，并对《红楼梦》有深入研究。
description.en: A contemporary Chinese writer and official, he served as the Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee, Director of the Committee for Learning and Cultural and Historical Data of the CPPCC National Committee, and Vice Chairman of the China Writers Association. He is a recipient of the national honorary title 'People's Artist'. His works cover a wide range of subjects, are particularly known for stream of consciousness literature, and he has conducted in-depth research on 'Dream of the Red Chamber'.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人、散文家、文学评论家。王蒙父亲的朋友，根据法国小说《茶花女》为王蒙取名。
description.en: Chinese poet, essayist, and literary critic. A friend of Wang Meng's father, he suggested the name 'Wang Meng' based on the protagonist of the French novel 'La Dame aux Camélias'.

description.zh-cn: 一种旨在建立无阶级、无国家、生产资料公有制的社会经济意识形态。
description.en: A socioeconomic ideology aiming to establish a classless, stateless society with common ownership of the means of production.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名高级中学。
description.en: A renowned high school located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党之一，在1949年前统治中国大陆。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China, which ruled mainland China before 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1957年至1959年中华人民共和国发动的一场政治运动，旨在打击被认为是“右派”的知识分子和异议人士。
description.en: A political campaign in the People's Republic of China from 1957 to 1959, aimed at purging intellectuals and dissidents deemed 'rightists'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国文化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责文化事务的组成部门，后与国家旅游局合并为中华人民共和国文化和旅游部。
description.en: Formerly a component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for cultural affairs, later merged with the National Tourism Administration to form the Ministry of Culture and Tourism.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任新华社社长、中华人民共和国文化部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of Xinhua News Agency and Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人、剧作家，曾任中华人民共和国文化部代理部长。
description.en: Chinese poet and playwright who served as the acting Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1989年在中国发生的一系列由学生领导的民主示威活动，最终以军队清场告终。
description.en: A series of student-led pro-democracy demonstrations in China in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会文史和学习委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会文史和学习委员会
全国政协文史和学习委员会
en: Committee for Learning and Cultural and Historical Data of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会下设的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees under the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 由中国各民族作家自愿组成的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization voluntarily formed by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、导演、商人。
description.en: Chinese writer, director, and businessman.

description.zh-cn: 作家王蒙的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of writer Wang Meng.

description.zh-cn: 《光明日报》资深记者，作家王蒙的第二任妻子。
description.en: Senior reporter for Guangming Daily, and the second wife of writer Wang Meng.

description.zh-cn: 中国古典四大名著之一，清代作家曹雪芹所著章回体长篇小说。
description.en: One of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature, a novel written by Cao Xueqin during the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国武侠小说泰斗，原名查良镛。
description.en: A highly influential Chinese wuxia novelist, whose birth name was Zha Liangyong.

description.zh-cn: 日本宗教家、作家、摄影师，国际创价学会会长。
description.en: Japanese religious leader, author, and photographer, who served as the president of the Soka Gakkai International.

description.zh-cn: 中国晚唐著名诗人。
description.en: A prominent Chinese poet of the late Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 根据茅盾先生遗愿设立的中国最高荣誉的文学奖项之一，由中国作家协会主办。
description.en: One of China's most prestigious literary awards, established according to the will of Mr. Mao Dun and hosted by the China Writers Association.

nodes.id: 人民艺术家 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 人民艺术家 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家荣誉称号，授予在文艺领域作出杰出贡献的个人。
description.en: A national honorary title of the People's Republic of China, awarded to individuals who have made outstanding contributions in the fields of literature and art.

description.zh-cn: 北京市在1928年至1949年期间的名称。
description.en: The name of Beijing between 1928 and 1949.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省青岛市的综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Qingdao, Shandong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙于1934年10月15日出生于北平市。
description.en: Wang Meng was born in Beiping on October 15, 1934.

description.zh-cn: 作为王蒙父亲的朋友，何其芳根据法国小说《茶花女》中的主人公阿芒为王蒙建议了名字。
description.en: As a friend of Wang Meng's father, He Qifang suggested the name 'Meng' for Wang Meng, inspired by the protagonist Armand from the French novel 'La Dame aux Camélias'.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙曾就读于北京四中。
description.en: Wang Meng attended Beijing No. 4 High School.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙在中学时期接触了共产主义思想。
description.en: Wang Meng was exposed to communist ideas during his middle school years.

description.zh-cn: 1948年，王蒙在中学时期加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1948, Wang Meng joined the Chinese Communist Party while in middle school.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙在1949年前曾组织反对国民党政府的学生运动。
description.en: Before 1949, Wang Meng organized student movements against the Kuomintang government.

description.zh-cn: 1957年，因小说《组织部新来的青年人》引起轰动，王蒙在反右运动中被划为“右派”。
description.en: In 1957, due to the sensation caused by his novel 'The Young Newcomer in the Organization Department', Wang Meng was classified as a 'rightist' during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国文化部

description.zh-cn: 王蒙于1986年至1989年期间担任中华人民共和国文化部部长。
description.en: Wang Meng served as the Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China from 1986 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙接替朱穆之担任中华人民共和国文化部部长。
description.en: Wang Meng succeeded Zhu Muzhi as the Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 贺敬之接替王蒙担任中华人民共和国文化部（代理）部长。
description.en: He Jingzhi succeeded Wang Meng as the (acting) Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，时任文化部长的王蒙“因病请假”，成为唯一没有参与慰问戒严官兵的部长，此举一度让外界担忧其仕途。
description.en: After the June 4th Incident, Wang Meng, then Minister of Culture, took 'sick leave' and became the only minister who did not participate in consoling the martial law troops, a move that once caused external concern for his political career.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会文史和学习委员会

description.zh-cn: 2005年，王蒙被任命为全国政协文史和学习委员会主任。
description.en: In 2005, Wang Meng was appointed Director of the Committee for Learning and Cultural and Historical Data of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2007年，王蒙推荐作家郭敬明加入中国作家协会，此事引发了争议。
description.en: In 2007, Wang Meng recommended writer Guo Jingming to join the China Writers Association, which sparked controversy.

description.zh-cn: 崔瑞芳是王蒙的第一任妻子，于2012年3月23日病逝。
description.en: Cui Ruifang was Wang Meng's first wife; she passed away from illness on March 23, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙于2013年10月1日与第二任妻子单三娅结婚。
description.en: Wang Meng married his second wife, Shan Sanya, on October 1, 2013.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙潜心研究《红楼梦》，并撰写了多部关于该小说的点评与分析作品。
description.en: Wang Meng devoted himself to the study of 'Dream of the Red Chamber' and wrote several works of commentary and analysis on the novel.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙曾与作家金庸就《红楼梦》进行对谈。
description.en: Wang Meng once had a dialogue with writer Jin Yong about 'Dream of the Red Chamber'.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙曾与日本作家池田大作就《红楼梦》等话题进行对谈。
description.en: Wang Meng once had a dialogue with Japanese writer Daisaku Ikeda on topics including 'Dream of the Red Chamber'.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙对唐代诗人李商隐有深入研究，并著有专门分析其诗词的作品。
description.en: Wang Meng has conducted in-depth research on the Tang dynasty poet Li Shangyin and has written works specifically analyzing his poetry.

description.zh-cn: 2015年，王蒙的长篇小说《这边风景》获得第九届茅盾文学奖。
description.en: In 2015, Wang Meng's novel 'The Scenery Here' won the 9th Mao Dun Literature Prize.

relationships.source: 人民艺术家 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 2019年9月16日，王蒙被授予“人民艺术家”国家荣誉称号。
description.en: On September 16, 2019, Wang Meng was awarded the national honorary title of 'People's Artist'.

position.en: Dean of the College of Liberal Arts

description.zh-cn: 王蒙担任中国海洋大学文学院院长。
description.en: Wang Meng serves as the Dean of the College of Liberal Arts at the Ocean University of China.

description.zh-cn: 王蒙曾任中国作家协会副主席等职。
description.en: Wang Meng served as Vice Chairman of the China Writers Association.
